entries.title: The Hottest Gen Z Gadget Is a 20-Year-Old Digital Camera
entries.description: Young people are opting for point-and-shoots and blurry photos.

entries.title: A New Area of A.I. Booms, Even Amid the Tech Gloom
entries.description: An investment frenzy over “generative artificial intelligence” has gripped Silicon Valley, as tools that generate text, images and sounds in response to short prompts seize the imagination.

entries.title: ‘Alexa, Why Do We Keep Buying You?’
entries.description: With questions swirling about the utility of voice assistants, we asked readers how they use one of the most popular, Amazon’s Alexa. Here’s what they answered.

entries.title: What Are Your Tech Resolutions for 2023?
entries.description: The Times wants to know how you plan to use technology differently this year.
